weekly: **New Features**: quick answers availability to all Suite and Knowledge customers, the move of Zendesk QA user and license management to Zendesk Admin Center, import enhancements for the Exchange and Gmail connectors, plus 10 more. **Early Access**: Zendesk QA for Advanced AI agents. **Security**: 0-Click Zendesk Account Takeover Vulnerability Enables Access to all Zendesk Tickets - CyberSecurityNews.
